nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, a group of Alliance Intelligence operatives were sent on a mission to the planet Bothawui, where they discovered that one of their number was, coincidentally, a dead lookalike of a criminal courier who was staying at their hotel at the same time. The similarity in appearance between Rebel and criminal courier embroiled the operatives in a game of mistaken identity between rival crime syndicates that culminated in a tense hostage situation, in which two Rodians attempted to kidnap both individuals. Local Bothan police ultimately captured the two kidnappers with the operatives' help.
The adventure leaves open the courier and the lookalike's shared sex and species, dependent on the Rebel player who fills that character role.
